content: I think I'll go with the fingering weight yarn for a more subtle effect. I've got some leftover yarn from my crochet projects, including some soft pastel shades that I think would work well for an ombre effect. Speaking of which, I've been using my Copic markers to add some colorful touches to my handmade cards and gift tags, and I was thinking of decorating the gift tag for this scarf with some matching pastel colors. Do you think that's a good idea, or would it be too much?
